activities: Employee Technology Solutions, Inc. (ETSI)provides web-based benefit enrollment and communication services to client companies. ETSI collects only the information necessary to enroll employees in company provided benefit plans. For the employer, ETSI collects names, addresses, dates of birth, hire dates, genders, marital status, nationalities, salaries, cost centers and employment status.
recoursemech: ETSI receives Human Resource Data in the context of the employment relationship. ETSI pledges to cooperate and comply with the local EU Data Protection Authorities.
